channel.title: Making a npc trade with you by talking to them
channel.description: i saw on a questscape based server they could talk 2 a npc (santa) and he traded with you...how do u do that? edit the talk to button to trade or what?

item.title: Making a npc trade with you by talking to them

item.description:

ill tell you im the owner for 400k
[center] :/[/center][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2006, 06:15:43 AM[/size][hr]wtf i didnt say that… wasnt even online and got warned for it…
